alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 29 at 8:18PM CDT until October 31 at 1:36AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River Near Rosser affecting Kaufman and Ellis Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River near Rosser. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, Minor to moderate flooding of low areas and roads within the levees is expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 34.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 31.0 feet. - Flood stage is 31.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 4.9 feet Friday evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
